articles.content:
Hu Jintao Meets Head of WPK Delegation 
    Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Friday met and had a friendly talk with Pak Yong Sok, chairman of the Central Control Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is heading the WPK delegation to the 3rd international conference of Asian political parties.
 He said that he was greatly pleased to meet General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il in April last and deepen the friendly relations and that he could never forget that time.

articles.content:
Mongolian President Supports Korea's Peaceful Reunification 
    Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- It is the hope of Mongolia that Korea would be reunified peacefully, said Mongolian President Natsagyn Bagabandi when receiving credentials from new DPRK Ambassador e.p. to his country Pak Jong Do on Aug. 30.
 Noting that the two countries have a good tradition of friendly relations spanning more than 50 years, the president stressed Mongolia would develop the relations with the DPRK in many fields including politics, economy and culture.    
 We are obliged to develop the friendly relations provided through the two Mongolian visits by President Kim Il Sung and several Korean visits by Mongolian leaders as required by the developing realities, he added.

articles.content:
Vol. 55 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Published
    Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Volume 55 of the "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House. It is a library of immortal Juche idea as it systematically and comprehensively deals with famous works of President Kim Il Sung in a chronological order.
 The book contains his 26 works including important speeches, conclusions, talks, etc. made in the period from July to October of Juche 63 (1974).    
 Expounded in it are outstanding ideas, theories and policies the President set out in that period to accelerate socialist construction, reunify the country and accomplish the cause of global independence.

Chinese Party and Government Delegation to Visit DPRK
    Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A Chinese party and government delegation headed by Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, will soon pay an official good-will visit to the DPRK at the invitation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.

articles.title: Congratulations to Philippine Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Pakistani Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Shaukat Aziz on the latter's election as
prime minister of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished him success in his responsible work.

Congratulations to Philippine Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Alberto G. Romulo upon his appointment as secretary of foreign affairs of the Republic of Philippines.
 Believing that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will more favorably develop in various fields, the message wished him success in his new work.
